description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Paris FC vs Clermont in the Ligue 2
title: Paris FC vs Clermont: Ligue 2 stats & head-to-head
title_page: Paris FC vs Clermont: Ligue 2 stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Full Time
Second Half ends, Paris FC 2, Clermont 0.
Post
Lohann Doucet (Paris FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Post
Nouha Dicko (Paris FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Post
Fourth official has announced 5 minutes of added time.
Post
Yohann Magnin (Clermont) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Post
Allan Ackra (Clermont) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Post
Attempt missed. Thibault De Smet (Paris FC) left footed shot from outside the box is too high following a corner.
Post
Attempt blocked. Nouha Dicko (Paris FC) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
